meanings.definition: Resembling a comb in shape or structure.
meanings.sent1: The comblike pattern on the dress was very pretty.
meanings.sent2: Her hair had a comblike appearance after she brushed it.
meanings.sent3: The comblike design on the cake made it look too perfect to eat.
meanings.sent4: The rows of trees in the orchard stood in a comblike formation.
meanings.sent5: The comblike fence separated the garden from the rest of the yard.

meanings.definition: Having a structure or appearance similar to a comb.
meanings.sent1: The comblike teeth of the zipper made it easy to open.
meanings.sent2: The comblike ridges on the shell helped it blend into the sand.
meanings.sent3: The comblike shape of the clouds in the sky looked like a giant hair accessory.
meanings.sent4: The comblike rows of desks in the classroom made it easy for the teacher to see all the students.
meanings.sent5: The comblike structure of the coral reef provided shelter for many sea creatures.
